capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was just reading about Minerva McGonagall and it's interesting to note that she is an adult. I mean, she's been around for a pretty long time, even if she does look like she could be a teenager sometimes. Anyway, I'm quite certain that she's indeed an adult, and I think that's one of the things that makes her such a great role model in the wizarding world.

You know, I've always been fascinated by the life of Minerva McGonagall. She's an amazing witch and a fantastic Transfiguration professor at Hogwarts. I mean, can you believe she was only 36 when she became a full professor? That's incredible. And as an adult, she's still got so much energy and passion for teaching and fighting against the Dark Arts.
